title: Computer Science expert to host lecture on how data has shaped big experiments (University of ...
text: ( Source : University of Derby ) Date posted: 13 October 2015 A Professor in Computer Science is to give a lecture at the University of Derby on how Big Data has enabled key science experiments to take place - as well as the challenges large
